item.description:
Our second Thirsty First Thursday event will be at Alibi at the Liberty Hotel from 9 pm.

There may be a few of us are meeting at 7pm at Harvard Gardens for some Kobe burgers before heading across to the Liberty Hotel. Please feel free to come to Harvard Gardens for food/frinks earlier or just meet at Alibi.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Thirsty First Thursdays
